topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d46ee9636872131cf20600#post_54d46ee9636872131cf20600
I can recommend you to do what Twisty and me are doing right now, make an accout to another page and have fun there.
 
Being in one site forum can be somewhat boring with the time, and more if that is the only thing you do in the internet, so I suggest another account in other site where you can post whatever you can.

One example is Know Your Meme. 
The people there is cool, there are thread for everything, also you can upload whatever image to the image section.
